scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Central and local government reports, pamphlets and papers of the London Central (Unemployed) Body for London relating to the causes and incidence of unemployment in the United Kingdom and its cure including labour exchanges, benefits and relief. The collection is particularly rich in London material.

v. 1.Reports, 1886-1909, (reel 1) -- v. 2.Unemployment : Liverpool. etc., 1894-1908, (reel 2) -- v. 3.Unemployment : Oxford. etc., 1897-1909, (reel 2) -- v. 4.Unemployment, etc., 1890-1914, (reel 3) -- v. 5.Unemployed, Poor Law, etc., 1893- 1905, (reel 4) -- v. 6.Provincial Distress Committees, 1905 Oct.-1909, (reel 5) -- v. 7.London Unemployed, 1906-1907, (reel 6) -- v. 8.London Unemployed, 1903-1906, (reel 6) -- v. 9.London Unemployed, 1903-1908, (reel 7)

v. 10.Vagrancy and Labour Colonies, 1903-1906, (reel 7) -- v. 11.London : Central (Unemployed) Body for London, Minutes, 1905-1906, (reel 8) -- v. 12.London : Central (Unemployed) Body of London, Minutes, 1906-1907, (reel 8) -- v. 13.London : Central (Unemployed) Body for London, Minutes, 1907-1908, (reel 9) -- v. 14.Unemployed, Labour Exchanges, etc., 1887-1914, (reel 9) -- v. 15.Unemployment, 1893-1895, (reel 10) -- v. 16.Unemployed, Metropolitan Employment Exchanges, 1906-1910, (reel 11) -- v. 17.United Kingdom, Labour Dept., Board of Trade, 1908, (reel 11) -- v. 18.Central (Unemployed) Body for London, Reports, 1907-1914, (reel 11) -- v. 19.London, Central (Unemployed) Body for London, Minutes, 1908-1910, (reel 12) -- v. 20.Central (Unemployed) Body for London, Proceedings, 1914-1915, (reel 12)

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.
